sentence.Network_en: He was disliked because his manner was always full of braggadocio.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们讨厌他,因为他老是吹牛.

sentence.Network_en: Underneath his goofball braggadocio lies a kind of purity ( David Ansen )
sentence.Network_cn: 在他笨拙的自夸里蕴含着一丝纯洁 ( 戴维安森 )

sentence.Network_en: Fink: american frontiersman and folk hero known for his marksmanship, fighting skills, and braggadocio.
sentence.Network_cn: 芬克: 以枪法 、 斗技和吹牛而出名的美国拓荒者和民间英雄人物.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... brag 吹牛 braggadocio 自夸 braggart 吹嘘.
GRE词汇精选（五）|GRE词汇 ... brag v. 吹嘘 braggadocio n. 吹牛大王 braggart n. 吹牛者.
【最新】GRE单词(红宝书)TXT完全版 - 豆丁网 ... brag v. 吹嘘 braggadocio n. 吹牛大王 ； 大吹大擂 braggart n. 吹牛者.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a boaster): from Braggadocchio, the name of a braggart in Spenser's Faerie Queene, from bragor braggart +the Italian suffix -occio, denoting something large of its kind

auth_sentence.content: There are big moves, but no braggadocio moves.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are big moves, but no braggadocio moves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are big moves, but no braggadocio moves.

auth_sentence.content: He is all unregulated passion, braggadocio and resentment.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is all unregulated passion, braggadocio and resentment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is all unregulated passion, braggadocio and resentment.

auth_sentence.content: Forth won't convert anyone who never bought into the band's second-hand stonerisms and Northern braggadocio.
